    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L1
    [void]                                  2         6
    [main]                                  7         11
    [(]                                     11        12
    [)]                                     12        13
    [{]                                     14        15

    [int]                                   5         8
    [x$y]                                   9         12
